description:
Adds 2 costumes for Ryza, namely the "Summer Adventure!" costume and "Sea Breeze Blouse" costume that were introduced in previous games.

Featured costumes:
- Summer Adventure!
- Sea Breeze Blouse

Note: Costumes can be changed in the "Changing Room" from the diary on the desk in the atelier.
Please visit the official website for more information. 

This DLC is only available to users who have purchased "Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key Digital Deluxe Edition" or "Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key Ultimate Edition."
name: "Back to Summer" Costume Set
